title: Goblin Slayer: Brand New Day
alternative_title: Goblin Slayer: Side Story Brand New Day ; Goblin Slayer Side Story: Brand New Day
status: Goblin Slayer: Side Story Brand New Day ; Goblin Slayer Side Story: Brand New Day
description:
Description :
        Goblin Slayer has enjoyed many an adventure, but the people around him have adventures of their own!

A new spin-off from the wildly popular Goblin Slayer series following the lives of the many other characters Goblin Slayer and the main cast have encountered throughout their adventures.
